graphql.query:
mutation CreateServiceParamMapping {
  createSERVICE_PARAM_MAPPING(
    input: {
      ORIGIN_PRODUCT_ID: 1, 
      SYSTEM_NBR: "ALL", 
      PRIN_NBR: "ALL", 
      AGENT_NBR: "ALL", 
      SOURCE_SERVICE_PARAM_ID: 2, 
      TARGET_SERVICE_PARAM_ID: 3, 
      PLASTIC_TYPE_ID: "", 
      COMMENT_TEXT: "", 
      CREATED_BY_USER_ID: 30132453, 
      CREATED_DATE: "2025-05-06"
    }
  ) {
    SERVICE_PARAM_MAPPING_ID
    ORIGIN_PRODUCT_ID
    SYSTEM_NBR
    PRIN_NBR
    AGENT_NBR
    SOURCE_SERVICE_PARAM_ID
    TARGET_SERVICE_PARAM_ID
    PLASTIC_TYPE_ID
    COMMENT_TEXT
    CREATED_BY_USER_ID
    CREATED_DATE
    CHANGED_BY_USER_ID
    CHANGED_DATE
  }
}

query ListServiceParamMappingsView {
  listService_param_mappings {
    nextToken
    items {
        SERVICE_PARAM_MAPPING_ID
        ORIGIN_PRODUCT_ID
        VENDOR_NAME
        PRODUCT_ID
        PSCU_CLIENT_ID
        PRODUCT_DESC
        PARTNER_CODE
        SOURCE_PROVIDER_ID
        SOURCE_PROVIDER_NAME
        SOURCE_SERVICE_ID
        SOURCE_SERVICE_URI
        SOURCE_PARAM_ID
        SOURCE_PARAM_NAME
        SOURCE_EXPR
        TARGET_PROVIDER_ID
        TARGET_PROVIDER_NAME
        TARGET_SERVICE_ID
        TARGET_SERVICE_URI
        TARGET_EXPR
        TARGET_PARAM_ID
        TARGET_PARAM_NAME
        SYSTEM_NBR
        PRIN_NBR
        AGENT_NBR
        SERVICE_EXPR_MAPPING_ID
    }
  }
}

mutation CreateServiceParamMapping {
  createSERVICE_PARAM_MAPPING(
    input: {
      ORIGIN_PRODUCT_ID: 28, 
      SYSTEM_NBR: "ALL", 
      PRIN_NBR: "ALL", 
      AGENT_NBR: "ALL", 
      SOURCE_SERVICE_PARAM_ID: 238, 
      TARGET_SERVICE_PARAM_ID: 266, 
      PLASTIC_TYPE_ID: "", 
      COMMENT_TEXT: "", 
      CREATED_BY_USER_ID: 30132453, 
      CREATED_DATE: "2025-05-14"
    }
  ) {
    SERVICE_PARAM_MAPPING_ID
    ORIGIN_PRODUCT_ID
    SYSTEM_NBR
    PRIN_NBR
    AGENT_NBR
    SOURCE_SERVICE_PARAM_ID
    TARGET_SERVICE_PARAM_ID
    PLASTIC_TYPE_ID
    COMMENT_TEXT
    CREATED_BY_USER_ID
    CREATED_DATE
    CHANGED_BY_USER_ID
    CHANGED_DATE
  }
}

mutation UpdateServiceParamMapping {
  updateSERVICE_PARAM_MAPPING(
    input: {
        SERVICE_PARAM_MAPPING_ID: 250
        ORIGIN_PRODUCT_ID: 28, 
        SYSTEM_NBR: "ALL", 
        PRIN_NBR: "ALL", 
        AGENT_NBR: "ALL", 
        SOURCE_SERVICE_PARAM_ID: 238, 
        TARGET_SERVICE_PARAM_ID: 266, 
        PLASTIC_TYPE_ID: "", 
        COMMENT_TEXT: "", 
        CREATED_BY_USER_ID: 30132453, 
        CREATED_DATE: "2025-05-15"
    }) {
      SERVICE_PARAM_MAPPING_ID
      ORIGIN_PRODUCT_ID
      SYSTEM_NBR
      PRIN_NBR
      AGENT_NBR
      SOURCE_SERVICE_PARAM_ID
      TARGET_SERVICE_PARAM_ID
      PLASTIC_TYPE_ID
      COMMENT_TEXT
      CREATED_BY_USER_ID
      CREATED_DATE
      CHANGED_BY_USER_ID
      CHANGED_DATE
  }
}
